title: Feio (Dr. Carlos José Barata Pinto)
body:
He was appointed civil governor of Funchal by decree of December 18, 1917, and took office on the same day he arrived on this island, on February 5, 1918.

He left for Lisbon on March 12 of the same year, shortly after requesting his resignation.

1917: Appointment as civil governor of Funchal.
1918: Assumption of office as civil governor of Funchal.
